  1. 132/365: Digbeth

    May 24, 2011

    I stopped in Digbeth on my way home from work on Thursday and spotted about 10 future photo opportunities, including this.

    I'd originally planned on using another, better, photo for my 365 but I liked the light on this when I walked past, so this one it is. I can always go back and get my first choice again another day.
